home:
Build digital sheets for your T20 campaign enemies.
Edit it as you want. Buff and debuff the creatures as you like

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: The movement accepts just one value with no unit of measurement. On the sheet it's possible to write such details
attributes.secondDescription: Type just the attribute value. The modifiers are automatically calculated in the sheet

senses.title: Senses
senses.description: The sheet highlights just three senses. Other senses can be accessed inside the senses modal on the digital sheet

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: The sheet hightlights just three skills. Other skills can be accessed inside the skills modal on the digital sheet

abilities.title: Abilities
abilities.description: The sheet highlights just four abilities. Other abilities can be accessed inside the abilities modal on the digital sheet

loot.title: Loot and Notes
loot.description: Both the creature loot and the genera notes can be composed of long texts
